name: OtakuStream Theater Mode
description:
Like my other style, this aims to improve the anime-watching experience. This time, for OtakuStream.

I ran into issues getting this working in light mode for some reason, and it broke the page entirely. So, for now I've restricted the selectors so that they only apply if you've toggled dark mode on in the site's header. I'll look into this issue in the future.
